ygData.subject: Charming in the outdoors
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail My bard is 28, and if I have to spend another day running around chickenville in SK looking for Harriers and Avocets during primetime I am going to go
ygData.messageBody:
Hail

My bard is 28, and if I have to spend another day running around
chickenville in SK looking for Harriers and Avocets during primetime I am
going to go nuts. I enjoy the charming in the outdoors and made it through
level 27 and half way in to 28 with out a scratch on me =). Does anyone
know anything outdoors (especially static spawns) that is worth going after
at this level using charm? The chickens were nice because the spawns were
static in the village. I know there is Choon and Froon but they are
usually camped. Though the centuar spawns in the stables are static I
found it to be a bit risky.
